entry.title: Combined summary - GB V04
entry.summary: Secure Instant Messenger, also known as GoldBug, has released its latest version V04, which provides secure communication through instant messaging. The software comes with various features such as end-to-end encryption, voice and video chat options, file transfer, and group chat capabilities. GoldBug is an open-source software that can be downloaded for free on Windows, Linux, and macOS platforms. It offers strong security measures to protect user information and privacy, including a decentralized architecture that ensures no central servers are involved in the communication process. Users have the option to create anonymous accounts and use Tor network integration to enhance their anonymity.The latest version of GoldBug includes several updates, such as improved stability and performance, enhanced support for multiple languages, and better compatibility with various operating systems. The software now supports additional network protocols like I2P and Freenet, allowing users to connect with others securely on these networks. Overall, Secure Instant Messenger (GoldBug) is a reliable and secure messaging tool that provides end-to-end encryption and other advanced features to ensure secure communication. On September 4, 2013, Randolph D. forwarded an email to the Bitcoin-development mailing list regarding the release of Secure Instant Messenger version 04 through SourceForge. However, someone responded asking them not to post such topics on Bitcoin-development as it was off-topic and they had already been asked to stop in the past. The email also included a link for subscribing to LearnDevNow that provided over 1,500 hours of step-by-step tutorial videos for mastering Microsoft technologies. An HTML attachment was scrubbed from the email.
